Class Pokemon

  • java.lang.Object
    • Pokemon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Pikachu

    public class Pokemon
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the Base class of the Pokemon object and contains the key methods used by each Pokemon object
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Ed George

      • addEXP

        public void addEXP(int eXP)
        Add aditional EXP to Pokemon
        Parameters:
        eXP - Experience to add on to total EXP

      • getNEXT_LEVEL

        public int getNEXT_LEVEL()
        Get the amount of experience required to grow to next level. This is determined by setNEXT_LEVEL_EXP()
        Returns:
        Experience needed to growLevel()

      • setNEXT_LEVEL_EXP

        public void setNEXT_LEVEL_EXP()
        Work out the experience required to growLevel() based on current EXP.
        The formula is a cubic function and can be changed in future versions to vary the rate of growth for Pokemon Objects.

        This is described by the exp_nxt variable within the function.

      • getHP

        public int getHP()
        Get Current HP of Pokemon Object
        Returns:
        Current HP

      • setHP

        public void setHP(int hP)
        Set HP of Pokemon Object
        If it is set higher than the max possible value of HP (MAXHP) then the maximum value is used
        Parameters:
        hP - New HP value

      • isFainted

        public boolean isFainted()
        Has the Pokemon fainted (i.e. has 0 HP)
        Returns:
        false if HP > 0 and true if Pokemon has 0 HP

      • returnInfo

        public void returnInfo()
        Get basic stats about Pokemon

        Returns:
